headline: Stifel Maintains Hold on Datadog (DDOG) After Mid-Quarter Check
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight for Investors. On September 12, Stifel analyst Brad Reback reiterated a Hold rating on the stock with a $135.00 price target. The rating follows Datadog’s mid-quarter check in on Thursday. Consistent with previous meetings, the check in did not provide an intra-quarter consumption update […]
